Ñico.definition: Ñico is [one of the most] empathetic people I know. He always listens when you need him and always tries to help. He pays attention to every little detail of his fellow [human being]. He's good at hiding his feelings, he's fun to talk to and you can trust him very much. Ñico is also very smart and really cares about other people. He also has a really funny lough and he loves football ([american football] AND soccer). You can feel, that he cares very much about anyone in his life, he listens very good if you tell him something important and he is interessted in your wellbeing. I am really thankful and happy to have a Ñico in my life!
Ñico.example:
[Person 1]: I found [somebody] I can really trust.
[Person 2]: Oh, that must be a Ñico!!
